aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: My name is Jan Kanovsky and I help deliver smart software solutions
paragraphs: I am a dedicated software developer with a strong background in backend development and software testing, supported by a Bachelor's degree in Informatics from the Faculty of Economics and Management at CZU Prague. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Informatics at the Czech University of Life Sciences, I am committed to advancing my expertise in technology and development.

With over three years of experience as a Backend Developer at Seyfor, I have honed my skills in building robust software solutions. My prior roles include working as a Java Developer and Software Tester at MOPET CZ, where I gained valuable experience in software quality assurance and development. I have also contributed to customer support and testing roles at organizations like Seznam.cz and Česká spořitelna, showcasing my ability to adapt to various aspects of the tech industry.

Driven by a passion for technology, I continuously seek opportunities to learn and grow. My skill set includes proficiency in C# and Java, alongside a solid foundation in testing methodologies and problem-solving. I am enthusiastic about leveraging my skills to develop innovative solutions and contribute to impactful projects.

hero.title: Build software effortlessly
hero.subtitle: I craft intelligent solutions to help you

experiences.description: Developing robust backend solutions, improving application performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver software solutions.
Focused on Java development, bug fixing, and testing software for MOPET CZ.
Testing web and mobile applications, providing feedback to the development team, and ensuring high software quality.
Testování mobilní aplikace, poskytování zpětné vazby vývojovému týmu a zajištění vysoké kvality softwaru.

universities.description: Developing expertise in advanced informatics and software engineering, participating in collaborative research projects, and being a member of the university’s tech innovation club.

university.name: Faculty of Economics and Management, CZU Prague

universities.description: Graduated with distinction, completed a thesis on efficient algorithms for software testing, and interned at Seznam.cz as part of a university collaboration program.

Studied advanced topics in software development and international relations, participated in cultural exchange programs to strengthen global collaboration skills, and developed a deeper understanding of the Korean technology and innovation landscape.

projects.name: Crypto currency tracking
projects.description: Application using coin market cap api to fetch prices of crypto currencies every day so user can track their portfolio prices on day to day basis.
